sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter to Mr Penn with his answer. Popple, William, d. 1708. Penn, William, 1644-1718.
10 p.
Printed for Andrew Sowle and are to be sold by the several booksellers in London ..., London : [1688].
Published anonymously. Authorship from Wing. Letter by Popple dated: October the 20th. 1688; answer by Penn dated: October the 24th. 1688. A letter to William Penn offering him advice about his relations in the royal court and response by Penn on matter of freedom of religion. Imperfect: title page cropped at lower margin with loss of part of imprint and date of publication. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland. To the Honourable William Penn Esq. Proprietor and Governour of Pensylvania -- Mr. Penn's answer to the foregoing letter.
=======
